description: Triangle with a(n,n)=1, a(n,k)=(n-1)*a(n-1,k)+a(n-2,k) for n>k.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Rows n = 0..120 of triangle, flattened
formula: a(n, k)=k*a(n, k+1)+a(n, k+2) for n>k.
prog: (Haskell)a062323 n k = a062323_tabl !! n !! ka062323_row n = a062323_tabl !! na062323_tabl = map fst $ iterate f ([1], [0,1]) where   f (us, vs) = (vs, ws) where     ws = (zipWith (+) (us ++ [0]) (map (* v) vs)) ++ [1]          where v = last (init vs) + 1-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 05 2013
crossrefs: Essentially the same as A058294, but more easy seen as a triangle. Columns include A001040, A001053, A058307, A058308, A058309. Other sequences appearing on the right hand side include A000012, A001477, A002061, A034262.
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Jul 05 2001
